K10D0358_H0366:413a-15: snrubs la ni rtsa ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413a-17: rtsa ba don du gnyer bas rtsa ba'i sa bon
K10D0358_H0366:413a-18: gzugs pa'i sbyor ba rung zhing rtsa ba ma yin
K10D0358_H0366:413a-19: pa rnams la ni ma yin no //
K10D0358_H0366:413a-20: bu lon rnying pa bdas na mdun na nor gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:413a-21: rtsa ba don du gnyer bar grub cing /
K10D0358_H0366:413a-22: de bzhin du bud med thams cad dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413a-27: khyo ga rnams khrus bya ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413a-28: rtsa ba thams cad sbyar ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413a-29: bkra shis kyi las bya ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413a-30: drag po'i las rnams 'grub cing phye btags pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413a-31: chang gi sbyor ba la rtag tu bzang zhing /
K10D0358_H0366:413a-32: de la skyes pa nor dang ldan zhing bu mang la 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K10D0358_H0366:413a-33: de la snad pa mi 'tsho bar bstan to //
K10D0358_H0366:413a-34: de la char bab pa legs par 'bab par mngon par bstan te /
K10D0358_H0366:413a-36: chu stod la ni chu bsgyur ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413b-1: zhing la chu blug pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413b-3: lam du sbyin pa'i chu gzhag pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413b-6: me tog la chu blug pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413b-7: skyed mos tshal bya ba dang; slong ba dgos pa
K10D0358_H0366:413b-8: la sbyar ba la bzang zhing drang ba'i las rnams
K10D0358_H0366:413b-9: 'grub cing de las gzhan ni mkhas pas mi bya'o
K10D0358_H0366:413b-10: // de la mes tshig pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413b-11: rims kyis btab pa mi 'tsho bar bstan to //
K10D0358_H0366:413b-12: nyi ma de la skyes pa ni tshe ring zhing tshul khrims kyi ngang tshul can dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413b-15: chu smad la ni dgra mi bya zhing gos drub pa bya zhing bgo bar ni mi bya'o //
K10D0358_H0366:413b-20: de bzhin du grong dpon bsko ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413b-21: tshong dpon bsko ba dang; rgyal po'i dgos pa rnams de la bya bar bzang ngo //
K10D0358_H0366:413b-22: nyi ma de la skyes pa 'khor mang po'i ngang tshul can dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413b-23: byas pa gzo bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:413b-24: grogs po dang gcugs shing bsod nams dman zhing mkhas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:413b-25: tsha bas btab pa mi sos shing brtan par bstan to //
K10D0358_H0366:413b-26: nyi ma de la char bab pa legs par 'bab par bstan te /
K10D0358_H0366:413b-28: byi bzhin la tshangs pa'i lha'i mchod pa mi bya zhing /
K10D0358_H0366:413b-29: gro bzhin la ni g-yul sprad par bya yi /
K10D0358_H0366:413b-31: bklags pa rnams myur bar 'grub bo //
K10D0358_H0366:414a-0: @414a *// rgyal por dbang bskur ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414a-1: bram ze'i las thams cad de la bya zhing gtor ma gtong ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414a-2: dpung la lta bar bzang ngo //
K10D0358_H0366:414a-3: de la skyes pa ni nad med pa dang; stobs dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414a-4: mchog sbyin gyi ngang tshul can du 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:414a-5: nyi ma de la char bab pa ni legs par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:414a-6: de la gro bzhin dang zla bar 'dzom na stor ba phyir rnyed par 'gyur te /
K10D0358_H0366:414a-8: mon gre ni myur ba'i rgyu skar te /
K10D0358_H0366:414a-9: mchod pa'i las thams cad dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414a-10: bram ze'i rig byed bklags pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414a-12: rgyal por dbang bskur ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414a-13: bram ze'i las bya ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414a-15: grong khyer gyi tshogs kyi dpon bsko ba la bzang ngo //
K10D0358_H0366:414a-16: de la skyes pa ni yid gzhungs zhing grags pa
K10D0358_H0366:414a-17: dang ldan pa longs sbyod che la nor mang dang
K10D0358_H0366:414a-18: / bu mang zhing dul ba'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:414a-22: bcings pa rnams dka' bas phyir thob bo //
K10D0358_H0366:414a-23: nyi ma de la char bab pa ni zhag bzhi'i bar du 'bab ste /
K10D0358_H0366:414a-25: mon gru la ni rtag tu sman sbyar ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414a-27: srid srung gi las rnams byas na 'grub cing zong btsong ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414a-32: rgya mtshor tshong pa chas pa bzang ngo //
K10D0358_H0366:414a-33: de la rgyal po'i bka' gsal ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414b-3: yi ge ba bsko ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414b-6: nyi ma de la gter brko zhing brdzang ba ni mi bya'o //
K10D0358_H0366:414b-7: gter sar ba bzhag cing sman bza' bar bzang zhing /
K10D0358_H0366:414b-8: stor ba yun ring po nas btsal ba rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:414b-9: de la skyes pa ni nad med pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414b-10: khro zhing gnyid che bar 'gyur te //
K10D0358_H0366:414b-11: nyi ma de la char bab pa ni legs par 'bab par bstan to //
K10D0358_H0366:414b-13: khrums stod la ni drag po'i sbyor ba thams cad 'grub par brjod do //
K10D0358_H0366:414b-15: rims kyis btab pa de dag mi 'tsho bar bstan te /
K10D0358_H0366:414b-16: de la skyes pa dag ni rna ba gsang zhing
K10D0358_H0366:414b-17: longs spyod che la gnyen rnams yid du 'ong zhing
K10D0358_H0366:414b-18: nor che la las mthun par byed cing spro thung
K10D0358_H0366:414b-19: bar 'gyur ro // nyi ma de la char bab pa ni drag por 'bab par bstan to //
K10D0358_H0366:414b-21: khrums smad la ni tshe ring ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414b-23: lho phyogs su mi 'gro zhing mi brtsam mo //
K10D0358_H0366:414b-24: de la skyes pa ni tshe ring zhing grags pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414b-26: sum 'gyur gyis lto che zhing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:414b-27: nyi ma de la char bab pa ni bde bar 'bab par bstan to //
K10D0358_H0366:414b-29: nam gru la ni gser dang /
K10D0358_H0366:414b-34: rigs rgyud kyi bya ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415a-0: chang gi las kyi bya bar bzang zhing btang ba'i las @415a *//
K10D0358_H0366:415a-2: lam sar pa gtod pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415a-6: gos sar ba bgo ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415a-8: de la skyes pa ni slong zhing sbyin pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415a-9: tshul khrims dang ldan la phongs shing gnyen rnams kyis bsten cing chos shes par 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:415a-10: char legs par 'bab cing stor ba rnyed par 'gyur bar bstan to //
K10D0358_H0366:415a-12: tha skar la ni skyes pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415a-25: de la skyes pa ni blta na sdug pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415a-27: rgyal po'i gnang chen phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415a-28: nad med pa la bu skye zhing skal pa bzang po ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:415a-29: char legs par 'bab cing stor pa rnyed par 'gyur te /
K10D0358_H0366:415a-31: bra nye la ni skar ma gsum yod pas /
K10D0358_H0366:415a-32: drag po'i las byas pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415a-36: chung ma blang bar bzang ngo //
K10D0358_H0366:415a-37: de la skyes pa ni 'thab krol dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415b-2: nad kyis btab pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:415b-4: de la char nges par 'bab par de ltar drang srong chen po rnams kyis bstan to //
K10D0358_H0366:415b-5: rgyu skar de'i lha gshin rje yin pas shi ba'i phyir zas sbyin no //
K10D0358_H0366:415b-6: de la skyes pa ni tshul khrims nyams shing bla ma la gnod pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415b-7: pha rol la gnod pa byed pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415b-9: pha rol la dgra byed par 'gyur ta /
K10D0358_H0366:415b-11: smin drug la sogs pa'i rgyu skar bdun dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415b-12: bra nye'i bar 'di dag las 'di ni bsdu bar bya ste /
K10D0358_H0366:415b-13: de dag gi nang nas gang dag 'bru thams cad dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415b-14: sman thams cad phun sum tshogs pa la gnod par byed pa'i gza' gnas pas bsrung bar bya'o //
K10D0358_H0366:415b-16: rgyu skar rnams kyi ming gi le'u bshad par bya ste /
K10D0358_H0366:415b-19: rgyu skar bzhi po 'di dag ni bde bar byed pa ste /
K10D0358_H0366:415b-22: de bram ze gnas par byed pa ste /
K10D0358_H0366:415b-23: de la gnas bya ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415b-24: rgyal po dbang bskur ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415b-25: gang so sor bstan pa'i las rnams bya bar bzang zhing /
K10D0358_H0366:415b-29: bcing ba rnams byas na bkra shis par 'gyur bar bstan to //
K10D0358_H0366:415b-31: de la skyes pa bkra shis pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:415b-32: sbyor ba chen po dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
K10D0358_H0366:416a-1: ni bde bar byed pa ste /
K10D0358_H0366:416a-6: las bya ba la myur zhing kha ton brtsams pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:416a-9: las rnams myur bar bya zhing mtshon gyi las dang /
K10D0358_H0366:416a-10: sman gyi las rnams bya zhing zla ba bzhi pa'i mchod sbyin bya bar brtsam mo //
K10D0358_H0366:416a-14: bcing ba rnams bkra shis par brjod par rig par bya'o //
K10D0358_H0366:416a-16: de la skyes pa ni bkra shis shing longs spyod dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:416a-18: longs spyod du ldan zhing gong ma la sbyin pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:416a-19: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i rgyal rigs su 'gyur ba'am /
K10D0358_H0366:416a-20: yang bram ze zhig mdun na 'don du 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:416a-22: rgyu skar lnga po 'di dag drag po ste /
K10D0358_H0366:416a-27: yang de dag la bshig pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:416a-29: bcing ba rnams mi 'tsho bar brjod do //
K10D0358_H0366:416a-36: mon gru zhes bya ba ste /
K10D0358_H0366:416a-39: bra nye ni zhing gnyis so //
K10D0358_H0366:416a-41: smad gsum gyi gnyis kyi cha'o //
K10D0358_H0366:416a-45: stod gsum po de dag ni cha nges pa yin no //
K10D0358_H0366:416b-8: rgyu skar 'di dag cha phyi ma'o //
K10D0358_H0366:416b-9: yud tsam sum cu'i zhing dang /
K10D0358_H0366:416b-10: byi bzhin gyi yud tsam mnyam pas rgyal rigs so //
K10D0358_H0366:416b-13: dge ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:416b-14: mi dge ba'i yud tsam dang /
K10D0358_H0366:416b-15: rgyu skar thams cad dang ldan zhing /
K10D0358_H0366:416b-16: gang gi gnyis ka dge ba'i yud tsam dang ldan pa'i dge bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:416b-17: yang gang gi tshe dge ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:416b-18: mi dge bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe thun mong ma yin par 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:416b-20: mtshan mo ring thung du 'gyur bar bshad par bya'o //
K10D0358_H0366:416b-23: tshes gnam stong du ldan par gyur la /
K10D0358_H0366:416b-24: gnam stong snga ma gro bzhin dang 'dzom na /
K10D0358_H0366:416b-25: nyin par la yud tsam bcu bdun yod do //
K10D0358_H0366:416b-26: mtshan mo la yud tsam bcu gsum du 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:416b-27: shing bu sor drug pa nyi ma phyed la btsugs
K10D0358_H0366:416b-28: nas grib ma la sor phyed phyed kyis 'phel zhing
K10D0358_H0366:416b-29: nyi ma 'gyur la; chu stod dang mtshan mo ldan
K10D0358_H0366:416b-30: la nyi ma dang mgo 'grogs shing dbyar gyi zla
K10D0358_H0366:416b-31: ba gnyis pa'i gnam stong dang mchur 'dzom pa na
K10D0358_H0366:416b-32: / dbyar gyi gnyis pa'i bco lnga dang khrums stod
K10D0358_H0366:416b-33: du ldan na nyin par ni yud tsam bcu drug
K10D0358_H0366:416b-34: / tu 'gyur ro // mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu bzhir 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:416b-35: sor gnyis kyi grib ma 'phel zhing bgyid do //
K10D0358_H0366:417a-1: ldan pa la nyi ma dang rgyal du 'grogs shing
K10D0358_H0366:417a-2: dbyar zla tha chung gi gnam stong dang chu stong
K10D0358_H0366:417a-3: du 'dzon par 'gyur zhing tshes bco lnga la tha
K10D0358_H0366:417a-4: skar du 'dzom na yud tsam bco lnga nyin par
K10D0358_H0366:417a-5: la yod do // mtshan mo la'ang yud tsam bco lnga yod do //
K10D0358_H0366:417a-6: sor gsum gyis grib ma 'phel zhing nyi ma 'gyed do //
K10D0358_H0366:417a-7: chu stod dang mtshan mor ldan la mchu dang nyin mor 'grogs shing nag pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:417a-8: dbyar gyi zla ba bzhi pa'i gnam stong du 'dzom
K10D0358_H0366:417a-9: la smin drug dang tshes bco lngar 'dzom na nyin
K10D0358_H0366:417a-10: par la yud tsam bcu gsum yod do //
K10D0358_H0366:417a-11: mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu bdun yod do //
K10D0358_H0366:417a-12: sor bzhi'i grib mas nyi ma 'gyed la rgyu skar
K10D0358_H0366:417a-13: tha skar dang mtshan mor ldan la chu stong dang
K10D0358_H0366:417a-14: nyin mor 'grogs na dgun gyi zla ba dang po'i
K10D0358_H0366:417a-15: gnam stong dang lha mtshams su 'dzom zhing mgo dang
K10D0358_H0366:417a-16: bco lngar ldan na nyin par la yud tsam bcu
K10D0358_H0366:417a-17: gsum yod do // mtshan mo la yud tsam bcu bdun yod do //
K10D0358_H0366:417a-18: sor lnga'i grib mas nyi ma 'gyed cing smin drug dang mtshan mor 'dzom la /
K10D0358_H0366:417a-19: nag pa dang nyin par 'grogs shing dgun gyi zla
K10D0358_H0366:417a-20: ba gnyis pa'i gnam stong dang snron du 'dzom par
K10D0358_H0366:417a-21: 'gyur zhing rgyal dang bco lngar ldan na /
K10D0358_H0366:417a-22: nyin par la yud tsam bcu gnyis yod do //
K10D0358_H0366:417a-23: mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bco brgyad yod do //
K10D0358_H0366:417b-0: sor drug gi grib @417b mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing mgo dang mtshan mor 'dzom la /
K10D0358_H0366:417b-1: sa ga dang nyi mar 'grogs shing dgun gyi zla
K10D0358_H0366:417b-2: ba gnyis pa'i gnam stod dang chu stod du 'dzom
K10D0358_H0366:417b-3: la mchu dang bco lngar ldan na /
K10D0358_H0366:417b-4: nyin par la ni yud tsam bcu gsum yod do //
K10D0358_H0366:417b-5: mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu bdun yod do //
K10D0358_H0366:417b-6: sor lnga'i grib ma 'grib pas nyi ma 'gyur zhing
K10D0358_H0366:417b-7: rgyal dang mtshan mor 'dzom la snron dang nyi ma
K10D0358_H0366:417b-8: 'grogs shing dgun gyi zla ba bzhi pa'i gnam stong
K10D0358_H0366:417b-9: dang gro bzhin du 'dzom la chu stod dang bco
K10D0358_H0366:417b-10: lngar 'dzom na nyin par la yud tsam bcu bzhi'o
K10D0358_H0366:417b-11: // mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu drug go /
K10D0358_H0366:417b-12: sor bzhi'i grib mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing mchu dang
K10D0358_H0366:417b-13: mtshan mor 'dzom la chu stod dang nyi ma 'grogs
K10D0358_H0366:417b-14: shing dpyid zla ra ba'i gnam stong dang khrums stod
K10D0358_H0366:417b-16: nag pa dang bco lngar 'dzom na nyin bar la ni yud tsam bco lngar 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:417b-17: mtshan mo la'ang yud tsam bco lngar 'gyur zhing sor
K10D0358_H0366:417b-18: gsum gyi grib mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing chu stod
K10D0358_H0366:417b-19: dang mtshan mor 'dzom la gro bzhin dang nyi mar
K10D0358_H0366:417b-20: 'grogs par 'gyur zhing dpyid kyi zla ba gnyis pa'i
K10D0358_H0366:417b-21: gnam stong dang tha skar du 'dzom la sa ga
K10D0358_H0366:417b-22: dang bco lngar 'dzom na nyin par la ni yud
K10D0358_H0366:417b-24: mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu bzhi'o //
K10D0358_H0366:417b-25: sor gnyis kyi grib mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing nag
K10D0358_H0366:417b-26: pa dang mtshan mor 'dzom la khrums stod dang nyi
K10D0358_H0366:418a-0: mar 'grogs @418a *// // mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu gsum mo //
K10D0358_H0366:418a-1: sor gnyis kyi grib mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing snron
K10D0358_H0366:418a-2: dang mtshan mor 'dzom la smin drug dang nyi mar
K10D0358_H0366:418a-3: 'dzom par gyur cing dpyid kyi zla ba bzhi pa'i
K10D0358_H0366:418a-4: gnam stong dang rgyal du 'dzom par gyur la /
K10D0358_H0366:418a-5: chu stod dang bco lngar 'dzom na nyin par la ni yud tsam bco brgyad du 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:418a-6: mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:418a-7: nyi ma phyed skad la sor phyed pa'i grib mas
K10D0358_H0366:418a-8: nyi ma 'gyur zhing chu stod dang mtshan mor 'dzom
K10D0358_H0366:418a-9: la rgyal dang nyin par 'grogs par 'gyur zhing /
K10D0358_H0366:418a-10: lo btsal bas yud tsam gyi bye brag rnams kyis rgyu skar de thams cad la cha dang /
K10D0358_H0366:418a-11: cha ru bgo zhing gnam stong dang /
K10D0358_H0366:418a-12: bco lngar phye bas mtshan mo dang /
K10D0358_H0366:418a-13: nyin zhag tu shes par bya'o //
K10D0358_H0366:418a-14: lo lnga lnga zhing zla ba re re lhag par 'gyur zhing /
K10D0358_H0366:418a-15: zla ba drug na nyin mtshan mnyam par gyur la /
K10D0358_H0366:418a-16: de las gzhan zla ba drug ni nyi ma ring
K10D0358_H0366:418a-17: la yang zla ba drug na mtshan mo ring ngo
K10D0358_H0366:418a-18: // zla ba drug drug ni yud tsam de dag mnyam par rig par bya ste /
K10D0358_H0366:418a-19: zla ba drug ni nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro la /
K10D0358_H0366:418a-20: zla ba drug ni lho phyogs su rgyu'o //
K10D0358_H0366:418b-0: zla ba drug ni @418b rgya mtsho la lhag par 'bab par 'gyur zhing zla ba'i 'gros dang /
K10D0358_H0366:418b-1: nyi ma'i 'gros kyis dus 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /
K10D0358_H0366:418b-2: rtsis dang bral bas shes par mi nus pa de
K10D0358_H0366:418b-3: ni 'di ltar lo yin par bshad par 'gyur ro

K10D0358_H0366:424a-17: yul de dag gi skye bo rnams la nad 'byung ngo //
K10D0358_H0366:424a-18: me bzhi la sa rnam par g-yos na srin po'i gdon gyis 'dzin cing /
K10D0358_H0366:424a-19: de bzhin du shan pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424a-21: so pa ri pa rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro; ;tshong gis 'tsho ba'i rje'u rigs dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424a-26: gyad kyi yud pa rnams dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424a-27: khu lo dang ldan pa'i bud med rnams dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424a-28: mdud pa 'grol ba rnams med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:424a-29: mon gru la sa g-yos na tshong pa rnams la nad 'byung zhing chos la dga' ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424a-31: sho gam gyi las byed pa rnams dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424a-32: rgyal rigs srid sgrub kyi rgyud dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424a-34: sin du ba'i rgyal po dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424b-0: mda' gzhu thogs pa rnams yun @424b ring por don med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:424b-1: nam gru la sa g-yos na g-yul drag po shom par 'gyur zhing grong 'joms par 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424b-2: grong gis grong phung ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424b-3: nir ta pa rnams dang rgya yul pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424b-4: ra ma ta ma gnas pa rnams dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424b-5: zhing las bzang po byed pa rnams dang; lung pa gnas pa'i gtso bo rnams dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424b-6: dmag dpon thams cad nges par sreg par 'gyur /
K10D0358_H0366:424b-7: ro; ;tha skar la sa rnam par g-yos na rta
K10D0358_H0366:424b-8: rnams la nad 'byung zhing grong rnams 'jig par 'gyur
K10D0358_H0366:424b-9: / spun zla gsod par 'gyur zhing de la mngal chags pa dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424b-10: de la skyes pa dang gsum sdug bsngal dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424b-11: rgyun du ldan par 'gyur zhing mdun rgyud dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424b-14: srid sgrub kyi rgyal rigs rnams phan tshun gsod par 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:424b-15: bra nye la sa g-yos na rkun ma rnams la nad chen po 'byung zhing rtsod pa 'byung ngo //
K10D0358_H0366:424b-18: me long gi 'khor los slu bar byed pa rnams dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424b-19: de bzhin du btson srung rnams dang /
K10D0358_H0366:424b-21: gnod pa byed pa'i skye bo mi bzad pa rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:424b-22: sa g-yos nas zhag bdun na sprin chen po g-yo bar 'gyur te /
K10D0358_H0366:424b-23: snum zhing gnag la ri bo lta bu ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
K10D0358_H0366:425a-2: dbang po rdo rje lta bu dang /
K10D0358_H0366:425a-3: de bzhin du der dus tshigs ltar nyi ma dang /
K10D0358_H0366:425a-4: zla ba sgrib cing de la kun nas sprin chen
K10D0358_H0366:425a-5: po'i mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing de dang 'dra bar
K10D0358_H0366:425a-6: mthong zhing the tshom bskyed pa'i sprin ldang zhing 'brug
K10D0358_H0366:425a-7: bsgrags pa 'byung bar rig par bya'o zhes drang srong
K10D0358_H0366:425a-9: de ltar shes nas gdon mi za bar sa bon rnams gdab par bya'o //
K10D0358_H0366:425a-10: bya rnams bsrung na tshong pa rnams kyi bya ba 'grub bo //
K10D0358_H0366:425a-11: de lta bu'i sa g-yos na thams cad du bkra shis par brjod do //
K10D0358_H0366:425a-12: yang sa g-yos nas de'i rjes la zhag bdun na sprin ldang ste /
K10D0358_H0366:425a-13: yang 'di ltar ka shi ka'i gos 'dra ba'i sprin
K10D0358_H0366:425a-14: gyis khyab cing mi mthun pa'i sgra sgrogs pas nub
K10D0358_H0366:425a-15: phyogs su 'gro la chu la gnas pa'i shu shu
K10D0358_H0366:425a-16: ma ra dang / ba lu ka dang /
K10D0358_H0366:425a-18: chu srin 'dra ba'i sprin snang zhing nyi ma dang /
K10D0358_H0366:425a-19: zla ba sgrib pa de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang
K10D0358_H0366:425a-20: ldan pa snang na de ni chus sprul pa yin
K10D0358_H0366:425a-21: par rig par bya'o zhes drang srong chen po rnams
K10D0358_H0366:425a-22: kyis de skad bstan pa yin no //
K10D0358_H0366:425a-25: zhing rlan dang bral ba de dag rnams la sa bon gdab par bya ste /
K10D0358_H0366:425a-28: chur 'gyur zhing dma' bar 'dus par 'gyur ro //
K10D0358_H0366:425a-29: de lta bu'i sa g-yos na ni chu'i yin pas shes pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K10D0358_H0366:425b-0: yang 'di ltar sa g-yos @425b nas de'i rjes la
K10D0358_H0366:425b-1: zhag bdun gyi nang du rlung drag po mi bzad
K10D0358_H0366:425b-2: pa ldang / dus tshigs ltar ser skyar snang la nyi ma dang /
K10D0358_H0366:425b-3: zla ba dmar por mthong zhing mtshan nyid de lta bu dang ldan par snang na /
K10D0358_H0366:425b-4: de ni rlung gis sa g-yos pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K10D0358_H0366:425b-5: de lta bur gyur pa ni drang srong rnams kyis bstan pa yin no //
K10D0358_H0366:425b-6: de lta bu la mkhas pas 'gro bar mi bya ste //
K10D0358_H0366:425b-7: bdag nyid bsrung bar bya zhing dgra zla las 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bas ra ba dang /
K10D0358_H0366:425b-8: 'obs kyis mchog tu bsrung bar bya'o //
K10D0358_H0366:425b-9: de lta bu ni sa'i sa g-yos pa'i yon tan thams cad bstan pa yin no //
K10D0358_H0366:425b-10: mi rnams kyis me yi sa g-yos pa'i khyad par rig par bya ste /
K10D0358_H0366:425b-11: gal te sa g-yos nas de'i rjes la zhag bdun
K10D0358_H0366:425b-12: gyi nang du skar mda' drag po ltung zhing dus
K10D0358_H0366:425b-13: tshigs ltar dmar la nyi ma dang /
K10D0358_H0366:425b-14: zla ba'ang dmar bar snang ba de lta bu'i mtshan
K10D0358_H0366:425b-15: nyid dang ldan par snang ba ni me yis sa
K10D0358_H0366:425b-16: g-yos pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K10D0358_H0366:425b-17: bud shing las me mched par 'gyur bas nor bsregs
K10D0358_H0366:425b-18: shing du ba'i phreng ba snang zhing mtshon mchog tu
K10D0358_H0366:425b-19: 'bab pa chu 'khyil ba snang ba zla ba dgu'i
K10D0358_H0366:425b-21: de lta bu'i sa g-yos pa mi bzad pa ni me yis sa g-yos pa yin te /
K10D0358_H0366:425b-23: rgyal rigs rnams la snga dro'i tsha ba'i gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing rta dang /
K10D0358_H0366:426a-1: la ni phyed la tsha ba'i nad 'byung la phyi dro ni ba lang dang /
K10D0358_H0366:426a-3: mtshan mo rkun ma rnams la gnod pa 'byung ngo //
K10D0358_H0366:426a-4: nam nangs pa na mtha' khob pa rnams la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
K10D0358_H0366:426a-5: de bzhin du nam phyed na ni zhag brgyad kyi
K10D0358_H0366:426a-6: bar du na bar 'gyur zhing de nas sos par
K10D0358_H0366:426a-7: 'gyur te / de nas yang bud med dang /

K10D0358_H0366:426a-19: dma' bar 'gyur ba rnams shes shing gang gis snga
